text: mehi hētuva nam, niyata vaśayenma movun veta (sādhakayangen) pæhædili ēvā samaga movungē dūtayin pæmaṇemin tibuṇi. namut (ovunva) movun pratikṣēpa kara hæriyaha. ebævin allāh movunva allā gattēya. niyata vaśayenma ohu itāmat balasampannayeku hā (pāpatarayinva) dan̆ḍuvam kirīmehi itāmat daruṇu kenekuda vannēya
